name: Horizon's Edge (obscuraonline)
description:
The Dream Begins...

Set in an alternate 1994, amidst the height of the internet boom, scrappy psychonauts and rising tech lords wage psycho-magical warfare over two very different visions of the future...

Meanwhile, somewhere in the woods, mysterious cultists hold strange vigils to unknown deities. Are they connected with the old research facility on the top of the hill?

It was a brief window in time where anything was possible.

Let's go back there, shall we?

A New Age is forming.

Only the Children of Silurus can determine what the future holds.

<>

:.
